creator: David.Holscher@nav-international.com
text:
I have the following definitions in a taglib.tld file:
  <tag>
    <name>object-xml-reader</name>
    <tagclass>itec.taglib.xml.poet.ObjectReader</tagclass>
    <teiclass>itec.taglib.xml.poet.ObjectUpdater$TEI</teiclass>
    <bodycontent>empty</bodycontent>
    <attribute>
      <name>parameter</name>
      <rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
    </attribute>
    <attribute>
      <name>xml</name>
      <rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
    </attribute>
  </tag>
  <tag>
    <name>xml-object-updater</name>
    <tagclass>itec.taglib.xml.poet.ObjectUpdater</tagclass>
    <teiclass>itec.taglib.xml.poet.ObjectUpdater$TEI</teiclass>
    <bodycontent>empty</bodycontent>
    <attribute>
      <name>parameter</name>
      <rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
    </attribute>
    <attribute>
      <name>multipleObjects</name>
      <rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
    </attribute>
    <attribute>
      <name>noRegister</name>
      <rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
    </attribute>
    <attribute>
      <name>defaultIsNew</name>
      <rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
    </attribute>
    <attribute>
      <name>xml</name>
      <rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
    </attribute>
  </tag>

Jasper generates variable names from the tag names with the -s included. - 
should be a valid character in an element name.
